about_the_game:
Combat Beta:
Our multiplayer combat battle arena experience is a 4v4 King of the Hill based match, you’ll be able to test a range of ship configurations against other players, live. Hone your strategy and tactics to take down your opponents as part of a coordinated team. Add your Steam friends to your team to coordinate your strategy and dominate the competition.

Upcoming game:
You are a Junker pilot, with only a buggy droid and a handful of zBits. With the help of fellow Junkers, you will use salvaged parts to customise your starfighters to your unique play style, then pilot them in the Grafter arenas for glory and gain. Design smart, fight hard.

Zero King is set in a future where humankind has been forced to abandon Earth and spread into the solar system, inhabiting planetary colonies, fleets of craft and clusters of space stations. Junkers and Grafters make, break, wheel and deal in the wake of intra-galactic warfare. While the post-Earth tech giants battle it out over resources and ideology, the exiles and renegades live like every second counts. On the edge of known space, a second is all it takes to go from starfighter to stardust.

Key Features:

🛠️ Ship Customization: Craft your ultimate star fighter with a wide range of customization options. Tailor your ship's load out to your play style and make your mark on the battlefield.

🔥 Epic PVP: Take the helm of a variety of customizable spaceships and engage in adrenaline-pumping battles. Take on ship designs that suit your play styles as you out fly and out fight your opponents.

🌌 Battle Arenas: Explore diverse battle arenas, each with its own unique challenges and strategic advantages. Adapt your play style to the ever-changing environment.

🏆 Competitive Multiplayer: Test your skills against players from around the world. Prove your worth in ranked matches, climb the leader boards, and earn your reputation as the galaxy's top Junker Pilot.

💥 Action-Packed Gameplay: With a focus on fast-paced action and strategic depth, Zero King offers an exhilarating gaming experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat.

Join the ranks of elite pilots and embark on a journey through the Zero King cosmos. The universe is your battleground, and victory is the only path to glory.

short_description: You're a Junker pilot. Prove your space combat skills in our free-to-play, post-apocalyptic, multiplayer arenas. Vanquish your enemies in King of the Hill style online PvP battles. Earn zBits to unlock new and exclusive ships. Coming soon: Craft and customise your ship to your unique play style.
